description: Least number that is the sum of two positive squares in exactly n ways.
references: A. Beiler, Recreations in the Theory of Numbers, Dover, pp. 140-141.
links: T. D. Noe and Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2178 (a(2179) exceeds 1000 digits).
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Square Number
Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
crossrefs: See A000446, A124980 and A093195  for other versions.
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
extensions: Definition improved by several correspondents, Nov 12 2007
